statements: SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, energy_savings FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE impact_on_sustainability='Positive';
SELECT community_id, initiative_name, start_date FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE energy_savings > 500;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, impact_on_sustainability FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives ORDER BY energy_savings DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE energy_savings > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, impact_on_sustainability FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE community_id = 5 AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT community_id, initiative_name, energy_savings FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT initiative_name, energy_savings, impact_on_sustainability FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE energy_savings < 5000 ORDER BY energy_savings ASC, initiative_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_efficiency_initiatives WHERE impact_on_sustainability LIKE '%positive%' OR impact_on_sustainability LIKE '%beneficial%' ORDER BY community_id ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM initiatives WHERE energy_saved > 1000;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives WHERE community_id = 10;
SELECT initiative_id, community_id, initiative_name FROM initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM initiatives ORDER BY energy_saved DESC;
SELECT i.initiative_name, c.community_name FROM initiatives i INNER JOIN communities c ON i.community_id = c.community_id;
SELECT * FROM initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, energy_saved FROM initiatives WHERE community_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT community_name, location, initiative_name FROM communities c JOIN initiatives i ON c.community_id = i.community_id WHERE initiative_id = 3;
SELECT community_name, SUM(energy_saved) AS total_energy_saved FROM communities c JOIN initiatives i ON c.community_id = i.community_id GROUP BY community_name;
SELECT community_name, sustainability_goal FROM communities WHERE community_id IN (SELECT community_id FROM initiatives WHERE energy_saved > 1000 ORDER BY end_date);
SELECT * FROM community_energy_initiatives;
SELECT community_name, estimated_energy_savings FROM community_energy_initiatives ORDER BY estimated_energy_savings DESC;
SELECT participant_name, role, join_date FROM initiative_participants WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT initiative_id, start_date, initiative_description FROM community_energy_initiatives WHERE initiative_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(consumption_kwh) AS max_consumption_kwh, community_name FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY community_name;
SELECT * FROM community_energy_initiatives ORDER BY community_name ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_id, community_name, start_date FROM community_energy_initiatives WHERE estimated_energy_savings > 5000;
SELECT c.community_name, COUNT(*) AS participants_count FROM community_energy_initiatives c INNER JOIN initiative_participants p ON c.initiative_id = p.initiative_id GROUP BY c.community_name;

SELECT c.community_name, AVG(e.consumption_kwh) AS avg_consumption FROM community_energy_initiatives c INNER JOIN energy_consumption_data e ON c.initiative_id = e.initiative_id GROUP BY c.community_name HAVING avg_consumption > 1000;

SELECT p.participant_name, i.community_name, i.start_date, e.consumption_kwh FROM initiative_participants p INNER JOIN community_energy_initiatives i ON p.initiative_id = i.initiative_id INNER JOIN energy_consumption_data e ON p.initiative_id = e.initiative_id ORDER BY e.consumption_kwh DESC;
SELECT * FROM community_energy_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM community_energy_initiatives;
SELECT id, initiative_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM community_energy_initiatives WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE electricity_consumed > 100;
SELECT id, consumption_date, electricity_consumed FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM community_energy_initiatives WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM community_energy_initiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE electricity_consumed > 1000 AND water_consumed > 500 ORDER BY consumption_date ASC;
SELECT initiative_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM community_energy_initiatives WHERE id = 3;
SELECT goal_name, target_date FROM sustainability_goals WHERE target_metric = 'renewable energy';
SELECT * FROM communities;
SELECT community_name, region FROM communities WHERE community_id = 1;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives WHERE initiative_id = 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM initiatives_metrics WHERE initiative_id = 3;
SELECT organization_name, contact_email FROM organizations WHERE organization_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM communities;
SELECT * FROM initiatives WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM initiatives JOIN initiatives_metrics ON initiatives.initiative_id = initiatives_metrics.initiative_id;

SELECT organization_name, initiative_name FROM organizations JOIN organizations_initiatives ON organizations.organization_id = organizations_initiatives.organization_id JOIN initiatives ON organizations_initiatives.initiative_id = initiatives.initiative_id;
SELECT community_name, region FROM communities WHERE region = 'West' ORDER BY community_name DESC;
